subject: VAM PRO Haptic motors not working
description_text:
Hello

Order no. 205-8346337-2842728. Simsonn ProX Ultra pedal set


I have recently ordered the Simsonn Ultra pedals and Haptic motors which
have only just been delivered.

I have followed the instructions and connected the haptic motors and upload
the latest software etc. the software appears to recognise the motors etc
but the output appears to be very sporadic and intermittent. I’ve been
unable to get any constant output to the motors when applying force to the
pedals?

The motors do react when I press ‘test’ but again many times I get no
reaction when I press ‘test’ then I get vibration intermittently?

I’m unable to work out exactly what the issue is but suspect the control
box is not providing consistent output to the motors? The pedals appear to
work fine?

Can you advise if there is anything I can try to resolve please?

Screenshot of my settings attached
